oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tennessee postcard by Heather Ross
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color drawing by Heather Ross portraying Davy Crockett shooting a bear. This postcard is part of the Tennessee Bicentennial Mall State Park 1st Edition Children's Art Series. Features a divided back, narrative, and a semi-transparent logo for the state park on reverse. [No. 327610]
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Drawings; Bears; Hunting; Men
